New Expand Collapse interaction Insert picture Ten new mind map themes New audio playing feature tap on the icon on the right top corner of the note list page choose Show Audios Now you could play audio on the note list page Long press the folder list could launch the sorting feature Fixed the crash issue when moving a folder or tag Fixed the problem that the handwriting area missed after inserting an image Fixed the bug that can not collect the web page when copying the same last link Fixed the crash issue after setting the Outline as default note template
